meta_description: UMLAUF Sculpture Garden + Museum is open to the public, admission can be purchased in person.
hours_text:
# VISIT

## VISIT

ADMISSION

## HOURS

## ADMISSION

HOURS

TUESDAY — FRIDAY 10 AM — 4 PM  
SATURDAY — SUNDAY 11 AM — 4 PM  
MONDAY Closed

EXTENDED HOURS UNTIL 9PM  
January 7th & 21st  
February 4th & 18th​​

HOLIDAY CLOSURES   
Independence Day  
Thanksgiving Day + The Day After Thanksgiving  
Dec. 24th - 25th

  * [](https://www.facebook.com/UmlaufSculpture/)
  * [](https://www.instagram.com/umlaufsculpture/?hl=en)
  * [](https://twitter.com/umlaufsculpture?lang=en)
  * [](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg-stICzBDaj3KnvZeN8wog)

INTERESTED IN A TOUR EXPERIENCE?  
We have public and private guided tours available. Learn more [here](https://www.umlaufsculpture.org/tours).

ADULT — $8  
SENIOR (60+) — $6

ACTIVE MILITARY & VETERAN — $4​​

K-12 TEACHER — $4​​

COLLEGE STUDENT — $4

YOUTH (K-12) — $2

CHILD (0-4 YRS) — Free

[MUSEUMS FOR ALL](https://museums4all.org/) — Free for family (with EBT card & photo ID)

MEMBERS** — Free​

​

RECIPROCAL ADMISSION​:

[Texas Association of Museums**](http://www.texasmuseums.org/)

1 FREE admission per card holder

​

[North American ](http://narmassociation.org/)[Reciprocal Museum Association**](http://narmassociation.org/)

1 FREE admission per card holder 

​

**must present proof of membership upon arrival

​

Childcare groups/large parties (8+ attendees) must [contact the UMLAUF](mailto:programs@umlaufsculpture.org) prior to your visit. 

If you would like to book a guided tour with one of our Docents, [please click here.](https:...

collections_text:
[](https://www.umlaufsculpture.org/exhibitions/black-bird-redemption-song)

  * MoonLAUF

Wed, Jan 21

Step into the Garden after dark for MoonLAUF, a special evening of extended hours and illuminated art. Wander the UMLAUF Sculpture Garden & Museum under the night sky and explore Design Shine, our vibrant outdoor exhibition that comes to life with light after sunset. Open until 9:00PM.

[](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.umlaufsculpture.org/event-details/moonlauf-2026-01-21-16-00?lang=en&quote=Check%20out%20this%20event.%20Hope%20to%20see%20you%20there!)[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://www.umlaufsculpture.org/event-details/moonlauf-2026-01-21-16-00?lang=en&text=Check%20out%20this%20event.%20Hope%20to%20see%20you%20there!)[](https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.umlaufsculpture.org%2Fevent-details%2Fmoonlauf-2026-01-21-16-00%3Flang%3Den)

  * Black Bird Redemption Song Exhibition Tour

Fri, Jan 23

Join our staff at 11:00AM for an engaging tour of our current exhibition, Black Bird Redemption Song by Sedrick Huckaby. The tour is included with admission and is fully indoors! No RSVP necessary.

[](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.umlaufsculpture.org/event-details/black-bird-redemption-song-exhibition-tour-2026-01-23-11-00?lang=en&quote=Check%20out%20this%20event.%20Hope%20to%20see%20you%20there!)[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://www.umlaufsculpture.org/event-details/bl...
